MAN.TITLE: Etherlab Scicos Realtime

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: Enables Realtime behavior. The scicos solver realtime flag should be disabled. For higher process priority, scilab has to be started as root.

DESCRIPTION.P: This Block changes the process priority of scilab/scicos to RT-priority. The realtime behavior is implemented by the function call clock nanosleep.
